ayas.arabic: الٓمٓ
ayas.translation: A. L. M.
ayas.transliteration: alif lām mīm

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: (This is) the Revelation of the Book in which there is no doubt,- from the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlul kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۚ بَلْ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Or do they say, "He has forged it"? Nay, it is the Truth from thy Lord, that thou mayest admonish a people to whom no warner has come before thee: in order that they may receive guidance.
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūnaf-tarāh ۚ bal huwal ḥaqqu min rabbika litundhira qawman mā atāhum min nadhīrin min qablika la`allahum yahtadūn

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ ۖ مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا شَفِيعٍ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth, and all between them, in six Days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): ye have none, besides Him, to protect or intercede (for you): will ye not then receive admonition?
ayas.transliteration: allāhul ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin thummas-tawā `alal-`arsh ۖ mā lakum min dūnihi min waliyyin walā shafī` ۚ afalā tatadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: يُدَبِّرُ ٱلْأَمْرَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يَعْرُجُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥٓ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
ayas.translation: He rules (all) affairs from the heavens to the earth: in the end will (all affairs) go up to Him, on a Day, the space whereof will be (as) a thousand years of your reckoning.
ayas.transliteration: yudabbirul-amra minas samā-i ilal-arḍi thumma ya`ruju ilayhi fī yawmin kāna miqdāruhu alfa sanatim mimmā ta`uddūn

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Such is He, the Knower of all things, hidden and open, the Exalted (in power), the Merciful;-
ayas.transliteration: dhālika `ālimul ghaybi wash shahādatil `azīzur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْسَنَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ ۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلْقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ مِن طِينٍ
ayas.translation: He Who has made everything which He has created most good: He began the creation of man with (nothing more than) clay,
ayas.transliteration: alladhī aḥsana kulla shay-in khalaqah ۖ wabada-a khalqal-insāni min ṭīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسْلَهُۥ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ
ayas.translation: And made his progeny from a quintessence of the nature of a fluid despised:
ayas.transliteration: thumma ja`ala naslahu min sulālatim min mā-in mahīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦ ۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: But He fashioned him in due proportion, and breathed into him something of His spirit. And He gave you (the faculties of) hearing and sight and feeling (and understanding): little thanks do ye give!
ayas.transliteration: thumma sawwāhu wanafakha fīhi min rūḥih ۖ waja`ala lakumus sam`a wal-abṣāra wal-af-idah ۚ qalīlan mā tashkurūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا ضَلَلْنَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِى خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍۭ ۚ بَلْ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And they say: "What! when we lie, hidden and lost, in the earth, shall we indeed be in a Creation renewed? Nay, they deny the Meeting with their Lord.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū a-idhā ḍalalnā fil-arḍi a-innā lafī khalqin jadīd ۚ bal hum biliqā-i rabbihim kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ٱلَّذِى وُكِّلَ بِكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "The Angel of Death, put in charge of you, will (duly) take your souls: then shall ye be brought back to your Lord."
ayas.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malakul mawtil ladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ نَاكِسُوا۟ رُءُوسِهِمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ رَبَّنَآ أَبْصَرْنَا وَسَمِعْنَا فَٱرْجِعْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا إِنَّا مُوقِنُونَ
ayas.translation: If only thou couldst see when the guilty ones will bend low their heads before their Lord, (saying:) "Our Lord! We have seen and we have heard: Now then send us back (to the world): we will work righteousness: for we do indeed (now) believe."
ayas.transliteration: walaw tarā idhil mujrimūna nākisū ru-ūsihim `inda rabbihim rabbanā abṣarnā wasami`nā farji`nā na`mal ṣāliḥan innā mūqinūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَـَٔاتَيْنَا كُلَّ نَفْسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَـٰكِنْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنِّى لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: If We had so willed, We could certainly have brought every soul its true guidance: but the Word from Me will come true, "I will fill Hell with Jinns and men all together."
ayas.transliteration: walaw shi-nā la-ātaynā kulla nafsin hudāhā walākin ḥaqqal qawlu minnī la-amla-anna jahannama minal jinnati wan nāsi ajma`īn

ayas.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ بِمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَـٰكُمْ ۖ وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْخُلْدِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: "Taste ye then - for ye forgot the Meeting of this Day of yours, and We too will forget you - taste ye the Penalty of Eternity for your (evil) deeds!"
ayas.transliteration: fadhūqū bimā nasītum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā innā nasīnākum ۖ wadhūqū `adhābal khuldi bimā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ بِهَا خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَسَبَّحُوا۟ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَهُمْ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ ۩
ayas.translation: Only those believe in Our Signs, who, when they are recited to them, fall down in prostration, and celebrate the praises of their Lord, nor are they (ever) puffed up with pride.
ayas.transliteration: innamā yu-minu bi-āyātinal ladhīna idhā dhukkirū bihā kharrū sujjadan wasabbaḥū biḥamdi rabbihim wahum lā yastakbirūn ۩

ayas.arabic: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَضَاجِعِ يَدْعُونَ رَبَّهُمْ خَوْفًا وَطَمَعًا وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Their limbs do forsake their beds of sleep, the while they call on their Lord, in Fear and Hope: and they spend (in charity) out of the sustenance which We have bestowed on them.
ayas.transliteration: tatajāfā junūbuhum `anil maḍāji`i yad`ūna rabbahum khawfan waṭama`an wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَا تَعْلَمُ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أُخْفِىَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعْيُنٍ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Now no person knows what delights of the eye are kept hidden (in reserve) for them - as a reward for their (good) deeds.
ayas.transliteration: falā ta`lamu nafsun mā ukhfiya lahum min qurrati a`yunin jazā-an bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤْمِنًا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقًا ۚ لَّا يَسْتَوُۥنَ
ayas.translation: Is then the man who believes no better than the man who is rebellious and wicked? Not equal are they.
ayas.transliteration: afaman kāna mu-minan kaman kāna fāsiqā ۚ lā yastawūn

ayas.arabic: أَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ نُزُلًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: For those who believe and do righteous deeds are Gardens as hospitable homes, for their (good) deeds.
ayas.transliteration: ammal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti falahum jannātul ma-wā nuzulan bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوا۟ فَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَآ أُعِيدُوا۟ فِيهَا وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayas.translation: As to those who are rebellious and wicked, their abode will be the Fire: every time they wish to get away therefrom, they will be forced thereinto, and it will be said to them: "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire, the which ye were wont to reject as false."
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammal ladhīna fasaqū fama-wāhumun nār ۖ kullamā arādū an yakhrujū minhā u`īdū fīhā waqīla lahum dhūqū `adhāban nāril ladhī kuntum bihi tukadhhibūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَكْبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: And indeed We will make them taste of the Penalty of this (life) prior to the supreme Penalty, in order that they may (repent and) return.
ayas.transliteration: walanudhīqannahum minal `adhābil-adnā dūnal `adhābil-akbari la`allahum yarji`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ثُمَّ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهَآ ۚ إِنَّا مِنَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ مُنتَقِمُونَ
ayas.translation: And who does more wrong than one to whom are recited the Signs of his Lord, and who then turns away therefrom? Verily from those who transgress We shall exact (due) Retribution.
ayas.transliteration: wa man aẓlamu mimman dhukkira bi-āyāti rabbihi thumma a`raḍa `anhā ۚ innā minal mujrimīna muntaqimūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦ ۖ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ
ayas.translation: We did indeed aforetime give the Book to Moses: be not then in doubt of its reaching (thee): and We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsal kitāba falā takun fī miryatim min liqā-ih ۖ waja`alnāhu hudan libanī isrā-iyl

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْهُمْ أَئِمَّةً يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُوا۟ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ
ayas.translation: And We appointed, from among them, leaders, giving guidance under Our command, so long as they persevered with patience and continued to have faith in Our Signs.
ayas.transliteration: waja`alnā minhum a-immatan yahdūna bi-amrinā lammā ṣabarū ۖ wakānū bi-āyātinā yūqinūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
ayas.transliteration: inna rabbaka huwa yafṣilu baynahum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَهْدِ لَهُمْ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ يَمْشُونَ فِى مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ ۖ أَفَلَا يَسْمَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Does it not teach them a lesson, how many generations We destroyed before them, in whose dwellings they (now) go to and fro? Verily in that are Signs: Do they not then listen?
ayas.transliteration: awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā min qablihim minal qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyāt ۖ afalā yasma`ūn

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلْمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْجُرُزِ فَنُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا تَأْكُلُ مِنْهُ أَنْعَـٰمُهُمْ وَأَنفُسُهُمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يُبْصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And do they not see that We do drive rain to parched soil (bare of herbage), and produce therewith crops, providing food for their cattle and themselves? Have they not the vision?
ayas.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā nasūqul mā-a ilal-arḍil juruzi fanukhriju bihi zar`an ta-kulu minhu an`āmuhum wa-anfusuhum ۖ afalā yubṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْفَتْحُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"
ayas.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal fat-ḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَتْحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنُهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: "On the Day of Decision, no profit will it be to Unbelievers if they (then) believe! nor will they be granted a respite."
ayas.transliteration: qul yawmal fat-ḥi lā yanfa`ul ladhīna kafarū-iymānuhum walā hum yunẓarūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَعْرِضْ عَنْهُمْ وَٱنتَظِرْ إِنَّهُم مُّنتَظِرُونَ
ayas.translation: So turn away from them, and wait: they too are waiting.
ayas.transliteration: fa-a`riḍ `anhum wantaẓir innahum muntaẓirūn
